wantedanchors-desc: Adds a [[Special:WantedAnchors|special page]] which extends the core functionality of MediaWiki provided with Special:WantedPages but for anchors (<nowiki>[[...#]]</nowiki> links)
wantedanchors-intro: There are $1 pages which are targeted with broken hashlinks:
wantedanchors-perf-stats-load-content-or: Load wikitexts from all origin pages
wantedanchors-perf-stats-collect-all-anc: Collect all anchors to a single bucket
